TopicTitle: (might already be listed)idea: new gameplay mode

Articles.Content: in my thought of watching videos i thought of a new game play mode called hyper realistic of were that you kerbal are very specific on what they want and if you don't take care of your kerbals t hey will want to go back to kerbin and will try to ruin your space organization. they will not experience a "boom" event unless it is a very major up take in your space organization.

2 hours ago, coopaloop said:

 of were that you kerbal are very specific on what they want

4 hours ago, mcwaffles2003 said:

Where kerbals are very particular about their desires. Basically, a Sims mode.

2 minutes ago, K^2 said:

Where kerbals are very particular about their desires. Basically, a Sims mode.

Thank you for the translation. As for the idea... I'm set on kerbal sims

I actually would love to have a little hackathon with a theme "KSP spinoffs". Ideally, with blessings from Private Division, so that resulting games can be posted online for all to enjoy. Dibs on Kerbal Kart Racing.

3 hours ago, K^2 said:

I actually would love to have a little hackathon with a theme "KSP spinoffs". Ideally, with blessings from Private Division, so that resulting games can be posted online for all to enjoy. Dibs on Kerbal Kart Racing.

This is a big part of why I am excited for multiplayer if modding it is allowed. A lot of really good games started out as custom games, the battle royale craze was began as a day-z mod I believe and MOBAs came from DOTA evolving out of warcraft 3. I just want to see what the world creates
